Fun game but needs rebalancing and voice chat adding. Many killers complain about 4 survivors being on Discord, TeamSpeak etc. and thus effectively getting most aura  perks for free (IE Empathy, Bond, Alert if you have a mate pallet looping) since you can tell each other where you and your team mates are, and the killer has been sighted. Thus you are good to spend perk slots on more valuable perks as survivor. There is no way to stop this from happening aside from removing survive with friends (SWF), which would probably kill the game.. So should just bite the bullet, embrace it, and add voice chat and pinging so you can balance for more coordinated survivors and everyone wins.

It takes time, or get lucky, overall you gotta get used to it and then it becomes a good game!
